title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 9A. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 9A between Route 9 and eastbound
entrance ramp to IR 287 in the Towns of Ossining, Mount Pleasant, Greenburgh
and the Villages of Briarcliff Manor and Elmsford, provided that this route
shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Bear Mountain Parkway. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Bear Mountain Parkway between Route 35 and Route 9 in the

Towns of Yorktown, Cortlandt and the City of Peekskill, provided that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (c) Route 9. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 9 between the Bear Mountain Parkway and the northerly Village
of Ossining line in the City of Peekskill, Towns of Cortlandt and Ossining, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (d) US Route 1. The northbound
and southbound roadways of US Route 1 between the New York city line and IR 95, Exit 15 interchange, in the Village of Pelham Manor and City of New Rochelle, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (e) CR 70. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of CR 70 (Pelham Parkway) between US Route 1 and Route 22 in
the Village of Pelham Manor and the City of Mount Vernon, provided that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (f) Route 9. Route 9 between Beekman Avenue
and the eastbound entrance ramp to I-287, a distance of 1.7+- miles in the

Village of Tarrytown and the Village of North Tarrytown. (g) Route 118. Route 118 between Kear Street
and Route 100, a distance of 4.0+- miles. (h) Route 100. Route 100 between Route 118
and Route 9A, a distance of 7.0+- miles. (i) Route 100A. Route 100A between the
westbound I-287 exit 4 ramp and Route 119, a distance of 0.2+- mile. (j) Route 119. Route 119 between Route 100A
and Caldors at the Cross Road Shopping Plaza, in the Town of Greenburgh, a
distance of 0.4+- mile. (k) Route
172. Route 172 between IR 684 and Route 117, a distance of 2.2+-
miles. (l) Route 117. Route 117
between Lexington Avenue and Route 172, a distance of 0.7+- mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8155.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
